profiles.name: JAN HEINEMEYER
profiles.description: I love to find the blind spots in an organisation and help to grow from already existing potential rather than finding the silver bullet. My key competences: lead and motivate people, CRO, fixing process & company culture, change management, intermediary between business needs and operations

profiles.name: CHRIS KLUGE

profiles.name: JAN KYRI
profiles.role: Interdisciplinary problem solver with a focus on data
profiles.description: Interdisciplinary swiss army knife for data problems with minimal overhead. My business background and experience allow me to grasp business models and processes quickly, communicate with stakeholders on all levels and structure my projects. Complementing this is a solid understanding of SQL and Python. I understand technical concepts and data pipeline components and am able to choose the best tool for the job depending on the situation. Skills: SQL, Python, Data Engineering, Data Analytics, AWS, Postgres

profiles.name: BASAR KÖRG
profiles.description: Web tracking and data warehouses are my territory. I am making sense out of your data and take care of scalable reporting infrastructure your team will love.

profiles.name: JULIAN KOCH
profiles.description: In over 10 years of working in digital media, I've gained experiences in both design and development. I also developed a strong business skillset by founding companies and bringing new products to market.

profiles.name: DAVID DARNOWSKY
profiles.description: In a nutshell: My focus is to help teams creating great web & mobile based applications with a strong focus on user experience and conversion rate optimization — from a product strategy, user journey, wireframes, designs to a conversion optimized product. I have an IT based background (practical, academic) paired with the passion to innovate. My typical day: Solve problems, evaluate opportunities, bring solutions to life.
